sentences.sContent: Indeed, Facebook’s organization of information and relationships became, in a remarkably short period of time, a redoubt from the Web —a simpler, more habit-forming place.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, Facebook’s organization of information and relationships became, in a remarkably short period of time, a redoubt from the Web —a simpler, more habit-forming place.
sentences.sCn: 实际上，Facebook对信息和关系的组织，在一个显著的短期内，成了网页上的最后一块阵地 -- 一个简单的，更容易上瘾的地方。

sentences.sContent: Recently, I’ve discovered Qrank, a habit-forming multiple-choice trivia quiz built as an app for the iPhone and Facebook.
sentences.sContent_eng: Recently, I’ve discovered Qrank, a habit-forming multiple-choice trivia quiz built as an app for the iPhone and Facebook.
sentences.sCn: 最近，我发现了 Qrank，一个形成习惯的多选琐事问答的 iPhone 和 Facebook 的应用程序。

trans.tranOther: a drug or activity that is habit-forming makes you want to keep taking it, keep doing it etc
